Description:
COLLECTING POOL OF CANDIDATES FOR OUR UPCOMING PROJECTS IN IRAQ!Ironworker Duties and ResponsibilitiesRead and understand blueprints and project layout
Measure and cut metal parts to exact specifications
Install or fabricate metal pieces into columns, girders, or other structural frameworks
Repair or replace existing steel parts of buildings and other structures
Operate crane ball and other machinery to move metal pieces into place
Clean and maintain all tools and equipment to ensure they remain in good condition
Follow all industry and governmental regulations on safety protocolsSkills
Skills:
High school diploma or equivalent
Knowledge of how to handle metal properly
Proficient in industry tools and equipment, such as hand and power tools and welding devices
Excellent communication skills and attention to detail
